metadata.name: Intro
metadata.value:
We are OMP, a game changer that optimizes supply chains of the world’s leading companies with our very own smart software and services.  
Do you like improving internal applications? Do you take pride in being a people manager? Are you ready to further develop our own tools and purchase external tools to support our business processes for our internal teams?
Look no further and become our Team Lead Internal Applications at OMP! Through our strong growth, we offer plenty of interesting challenges for you to solve.

metadata.name: Profile
metadata.value:
We are looking for someone who meets the following qualifications:
A master’s or bachelor’s degree, or similar by experience. 
Design and programming skills, such as macro coding in VBA. 
5 – 10 years of management experience in application management and development.
A proven track record as a trustworthy and efficient people manager with strong project management skills.
Experience in recruiting top talent for your team and the entire organization.
An analytical mindset and the ability to keep track of the bigger picture. 
Good communication skills and fluency in English. You can connect with different stakeholders. 
The ability to work autonomously as well as in a team.

metadata.name: Bonus Points (Profile)
metadata.value:
Experience with SQL, Omnitracker, and Salesforce.
Experience with and knowledge of the benefits and pitfalls of working in virtual teams spread over multiple locations.
Willingness to travel.

metadata.name: Soft Skills
metadata.value:
Active listening
Conflict-resolution
Trustworthy
Communication
Patience

metadata.name: Hard Skills
metadata.value:
People management
VBA
SQL
OmniTracker
SalesForce

metadata.name: Your Future
metadata.value:
At OMP, we’re eager to find your best career fit. Our talent management program supports your personal development and empowers you to build a career in line with your ambitions.
Many of our team members who start as Team Leads Internal Business Applications grow into roles in software development, and people management.

metadata.name: Your Team
metadata.value: As our new Team Lead Internal Applications, you’ll be part of the Technical Services team. Technical Services equips our teams with the necessary technology, applications, and technical framework for them to do their jobs effectively and securely.

metadata.name: SEO Title
metadata.value: Team Lead Internal Business Applications at OMP

title: Team Lead Internal Business Applications
content:
As a Team Lead Internal Business Applications, you have a clear understanding of the organization’s vision and can translate this to motivate your team. You direct your team to optimize workplace productivity and promote professional growth.
You are responsible for:

Managing a team which is responsible for the overall technical design and architecture of the various (internal) applications and their connections. You ensure a sound data model that supports our internal processes and assist in making the right technology choices.
Working closely together with the colleagues responsible for the various tools and collection of the functional requirements.
Playing a key role in mapping business requirements to technical requirements and solutions. You’ll work with the technical consultants’ internal applications to design and develop solutions, validate these solutions with the different stakeholders, implement the developments, and train your colleagues.
Taking care of the release management of these tools and making sure the necessary resources are made available. You’ll also organize the internal support and maintenance of the tools.
Recruiting new team members by processing incoming resumes and feedback of reviewers and monitoring actions, events, and budgets.
Planning and following up on software development tasks according to scrum methodology.
Mastering resource planning for both internal and external projects, including the time logging application that measures the time consultants spent on different projects.
Preparing and analyzing data for the Business Intelligence reporting tool that shares actionable insights.

questions.label: Do you need a work permit?
How many years of experience do you have?
